channel.title: Posts on US Muon Collider Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on US Muon Collider Collaboration

item.title: Accelerator R&D
item.description: Recent progress in overcoming technical challenges posed by the muon’s lifetime has generated a great deal of excitement for particle physicists.

item.title: Reconstruction Software
item.description: Great progress has been made towards identifying signals and reject muon beam-induced background, but there’s still much more to do.
